Name: The search for DEEP loving
About the game: Finding true love, or some good loving, is not the easiest thing to do, especially when you don't go anywhere except work. So what's the solution? A free trial dating app that your roommate told you about. With 30 days to try and discover your soulmate, you have to work each day to see what's out there. Unfortunately, online dating is not always the safest way to meet people and each date could be fatal. Will you meet your soulmate or will you crash and burn, literally, in your search? With over 30 potential candidates and over 20 dates, you will have to play the game more than once to discover everything the game offers. Half the dates are based on true events, with a twist of course. 20+ custom images A wide variety of endings An autosave to keep you from losing your mind
